Latitude.description: The 'lat' value of the coordinate.  It ranges from -90 (South Pole) to 90 (North Pole)

Longitude.description: The 'long' value of the coordinate.  It ranges from -180 (West) to 180 (East)

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
